page.title: 18OUTDOOR RECREATION GENERAL
page.content: THERE IS A LACK OF OUTDOOR RECREATIONAL FACILITIES IN THE AREA.THE TWO MAIN AMENITIES ARE_ {MOSSLEY RECREATION GROUNDS}WHICH PROVIDE A BOWLING GREEN, 3 FOOTBALL PITCHES_ 2 FULL SIZE AND 1 7-A'SIDE PITCH, 3 HAND TENNIS COURTS AND A PAVILION WHICH HAS CHANGING FACILITIES AND A HALL USED FOR KEEP FIT SESSIONS AND WINTER TRAINING. {THREE MILE WATER PLAYING FIELDS NEWLY OPENED IN 1985 ARE FOR THE USE OF LOCAL SCHOOLS AND THE COMMUNITY. THEY INCLUDE AN IMPRESSIVE ATHLETICS TRACK, A NUMBER OF GRASS AND ALL WEATHER HOCKEY AND FOOTBALL PITCHES, TENNIS AND BASKETBALL COURTS AND RUGBY PITCHES.
